message:
Meeting Chandrakant Kulkarni was an absolute delight. People like him are true heroes of our nation. 

Chandrakant ji, a retired Govt employee, decided to give almost a third of his pension from June 2015 to Sept 2019 to Swachh Bharat Kosh. Chandrakant ji gave 52 post-dated cheques, totalling worth Rs. 2,60,000 towards a Swachh Bharat. The selflessness is admirable #MyCleanIndia
